statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT contact_person, location, supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, sustainability_rating FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, location, sustainability_rating FROM suppliers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL AND location LIKE '%LA%' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC, supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1001 OR location = 'Chicago' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT certification, location FROM Suppliers WHERE certification IS NOT NULL AND location LIKE '%East%';
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Procurement WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, supplier_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Procurement WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE certification = 'ISO 9001' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location, certification FROM Suppliers WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas') ORDER BY location ASC, certification DESC;

SELECT s.name AS Supplier_Name, p.product_name AS Product_Name, p.quantity AS Quantity FROM Suppliers s INNER JOIN Procurement p ON s.id = p.supplier_id WHERE p.quantity > 100 ORDER BY p.quantity DESC;

SELECT s.name AS Supplier_Name, p.product_name AS Product_Name, p.price AS Price FROM Suppliers s INNER JOIN Procurement p ON s.id = p.supplier_id WHERE s.location = 'Florida' AND p.price < 50 ORDER BY p.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT product_name, purchase_date FROM Products JOIN Purchases ON Products.product_id = Purchases.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM Products JOIN Suppliers ON Products.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, purchase_date FROM Products JOIN Purchases ON Products.product_id = Purchases.product_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, region FROM suppliers WHERE rating > 3
SELECT supplier_name, rating FROM suppliers ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 100.00
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, region FROM suppliers WHERE region='East' AND rating > 3
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date
SELECT supplier_name, rating, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN reviews ON suppliers.supplier_id=reviews.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING num_reviews > 1
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, country, city FROM suppliers WHERE is_certified = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE is_ecofriendly = TRUE;
SELECT order_id, order_date, is_completed FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM certifications WHERE is_renewable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, country, city FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE is_ecofriendly = TRUE;
SELECT supplier_name, country, city, is_certified FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT review_id, product_id, rating, feedback FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
